  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204326</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Birds of a feather, an interdisciplinary unit: Language Arts wing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birds Of a Feather, eine interdisziplinäre 
Maßeinheit: Sprachenkunstflügel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Birds Of a Feather, une unité interdisciplinaire 
: Aile d'arts de langage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Birds Of a Feather, uma unidade interdisciplinary:
Asa das artes da língua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Birds Of a Feather, un'unità interdisciplinare: 
Ala di arti di linguaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πουλιά ενός φτερού, μια διεπιστημονική μονάδα: 
Φτερό γλωσσικών τεχνών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Birds Of a Feather, una unidad interdisciplinaria:
Ala de los artes del lenguaje</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson, which features Mark Twain's "Jim Baker's Blue-jay Yarn," is part of an interdisciplinary unit on birds that contains math/science and language arts components. In the language arts wing, students will explore dialects and personification through this very entertaining tall tale full of the antics of talking blue-jays.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion, der Merkmale Garn Blau-Eichelhäher
des Bäckers Jim Twains "kennzeichnen," ist ein Teil einer 
interdisziplinären Maßeinheit auf Vögeln, die math/science und 
Sprachenkunstbestandteile enthält. In der Sprache wing die 
künste, erforschen Kursteilnehmer Dialekte und personification durch 
diese sehr unterhaltene hohe Geschichte voll der Mätzchen der 
sprechenBlaueichelhäher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon, que les dispositifs marquent filé 
du Bleu-geai de Baker de Jim de Twain le "," fait partie d'une unité 
interdisciplinaire sur des oiseaux qui contient math/science et 
composants d'arts de langage. En langage les arts s'envolent, 
les étudiants exploreront des dialectes et la personnification par ce conte
grand très de divertissement complètement des singeries des 
bleu-geais parlants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição, que as características marcam o fio
do Azul-blue-jay do padeiro Jim de Twain de "," é parte de uma 
unidade interdisciplinary em pássaros que contenha math/science e 
componentes das artes da língua. Na língua as artes voam, os 
estudantes explorarão dialects e personification com este tale alto 
muito entertaining completamente dos antics de azul-blue-jays falando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione, che le caratteristiche 
contrassegnano il filato del Blu-blue-jay del panettiere di Jim del 
Twain "," fa parte di un'unità interdisciplinare sugli uccelli che 
contiene math/science ed i componenti di arti di linguaggio. In 
linguaggio le arti traversano, gli allievi esploreranno i dialetti ed 
il personification con questo racconto alto molto divertente in pieno 
dei antics dei blu-blue-jays di comunicazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα, που χαρακτηρίζει jim Baker's 
Mark Twain "blue-jay το νήμα," είναι μέρος μιας 
διεπιστημονικής μονάδας στα πουλιά που περιέχει math/tmi'mata 
τεχνών επιστήμης και γλώσσας. Στο φτερό γλωσσικών τεχνών, 
οι σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσουν τις διαλέκτους και την προσωποποίηση 
μέσω αυτού του συνόλου ιστορίας πολύ διασκέδασης ψηλού του 
antics της ομιλίας blue-jays.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección, que las características marcan 
hilado del Azul-blue-jay del panadero de Jim de Twain el "," es parte 
de una unidad interdisciplinaria en pájaros que contenga math/science
y componentes de los artes del lenguaje. En lenguaje los artes 
se van volando, los estudiantes explorarán dialectos y el 
personification con este cuento alto muy entretenido por completo de 
los antics de azul-blue-jays que hablan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
